DOC.brief_summary: To assess healthy adult subject : - The tolerability safety ascend repeated oral dos Genz-682452 . - The pharmacokinetic parameter Genz-682452 ascend repeat oral dos . - The pharmacodynamics Genz-682452 ascend repeat oral dos .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics Study Genz-682452 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Body weight 50.0 95.0 kg , inclusive , male 40.0 85.0 kg inclusive , female , body mass index 18.0 30.0 kg/m^2 , inclusive . Certified healthy comprehensive clinical assessment . Any history presence clinically relevant cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , metabolic , hematological , neurological , osteomuscular , articular , psychiatric , systemic , ocular , gynecologic ( female ) , infectious disease , sign acute illness . Frequent headache and/or migraine , recurrent nausea and/or vomit . Blood donation , volume , within 2 month inclusion . Symptomatic postural hypotension . History presence drug alcohol abuse . Positive result follow test : hepatitis B surface ( HBs Ag ) antigen , antihepatitis C virus ( antiHCV ) antibody , antihuman immunodeficiency virus 1 2 antibody ( antiHIV1 anti HIV2 Ab ) . Positive result urine drug screen .
